item.title: Leaves not collected from road or pavement for several weeks, 7th November
item.description:
Half of the road’s pavements were swept a few weeks ago (by the council) but piles were left, residents swept leaves into the road as people are slipping on old wet leaves and tripping on uneven paving they can’t see, old leaves on are rotting into drains

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish bags dumped on pavement, 7th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lea Bridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Unleveled slabs on footpath, due to filled up with water from broken pipe underneath,, 7th November
item.description:
Been like this since weeks , as the pipe underneath the slab is broken and water being collected made it uneven , this can be dangerous to public and people with reduced mobility

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Clerkenwell Road, Clerkenwell, London

item.title: Waste left strewn over pavement, 7th November
item.description:
The bags are now gone but there is still loose rubbish strewn over the pavement. Happening for years now and still no action from Hackney council. disgrace

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Flytipping large items, 7th November
item.description:
A fridge and metal extractor pipes were left on the pavement by a hire vehicle with registration DN73XVP at 12:20 today. It is on Lovelace Avenue by the side fencing off 78 Oxhawth Cresent.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lovelace Avenue, Southborough, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicles, 7th November
item.description:
Outside 14,15,16 Haldane Road SE28 8NG, there are 3 vehicles that as used as storage for numebr of months now, 2 are shown as "SORN" (PK08USL, LG55HBO) and third one is shown as "Not taxed" GU59AFF. Can these be removed please as they take space.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haldane Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Installation pipe broken , under the public footpath , can be dangerous if not fixed as winder is due, 7th November
item.description:
Water flowing up from the public footpath, it can be dangerous when the water freezes in cold , it could be hazardous to people walking, they can trip and be injured, this is been ongoing for weeks as reported by the individual staying around the building

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Clerkenwell Road, Clerkenwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
